item.title: Women who have experienced stalking have a higher risk of heart disease, study shows
item.description: A big, new study shows women who are victims of stalking are at significantly higher risk of heart disease.

item.title: Chikungunya outbreak in China
item.description: More than 8,000 have been infected, prompting the government to institute COVID-like restrictions
